answer: Integrating Coveo with Salesforce Service Cloud involves three main steps. First, install the Coveo for Salesforce package from AppExchange and configure authentication„Äê1„Äë. sources.label: Coveo for Salesforce Installation Guide
sources.excerpt: The installation requires an administrator to deploy the package, configure OAuth for secure API access, and set up proper authentication between Coveo and Salesforce.

sources.label: Configuring Coveo Salesforce Sources
sources.excerpt: Creating a Salesforce source in Coveo requires specifying which objects to index, setting permissions mapping, and configuring field mappings for search optimization.

sources.label: Lightning Experience Implementation
sources.excerpt: Add the Coveo Search Component to your Lightning pages by dragging the component from the builder palette and configuring the search interface options.
